answers.answer: HI,Excessive seating and episodes of hot and cold are common during menopause and these are because of hormonal changes. However these are unrelated to exertion. You can get these even on rest. Excessive sweating on mild exertion can be a sign of a cardiac problem especially angina. Also diabetes needs to be ruled out. A baseline ECG should be done. Hence you should consult a physician for an evaluation.The answer is based on information provided. Exact advice is not possible without a proper examination and investigations. You are requested to consult your Doctor. Take care and keep us posted.
